2026-02-11.recap_text: Day 1 featured 2 games. The highest-scoring affair was Sweden 5-2 Italy. Juraj Slafkovsky (Slovakia) led the day with 2G 1A.

2026-02-12.recap_text: Day 2 featured 4 games. The highest-scoring affair was Latvia 1-5 United States. Timo Meier (Switzerland) led the day with 2 goals.

2026-02-13.recap_text: Day 3 featured 3 games. The highest-scoring affair was France 3-6 Czechia. Louis Boudon (France) led the day with 2G 1A. In Wally Cup standings, Johnny's Scrubbers moved up 3 spots. Todd's Hitmen dropped 1 spot.

milestones.description: Juraj Slafkovsky takes the points lead with 4 points
Rasmus Dahlin takes the assists lead with 3 assists
Juraj Slafkovsky takes the goals lead with 2 goals
